directions: In a non-stick skillet, over medium heat, lightly brown sausage.  Set aside. In a large salad bowl, combine salad greens, strawberries, apple, walnuts, cheese and sausage.
In a small bowl, combine vinegar, honey and oil.  Pour over salad and toss. Serve.
ingredients: 1 link Johnsonville® Apple Chicken Sausage, sliced
1 (5 ounce) package pre-washed spring mixed greens
1 quart fresh strawberries, hulled and quartered
1 medium Granny Smith apple, cored and cut into chunks
title: Johnsonville Strawberry and Apple Chicken Sausage Salad
